caption:
The photograph depicts an elderly man in a domestic setting, concentrating on cooking with an old-fashioned, possibly vintage, stovetop. The stovetop is white and features four burners, with a kettle sitting on top. The man appears to be stirring or tending to something on one of the burners. He is dressed in a simple, light-colored shirt and darker pants.

The lighting in the image casts a warm, yellowish hue, contributing to an intimate, cozy atmosphere. A bare light bulb can be seen in the background, illuminating the scene from above. Behind the man, there is a partially visible doorway painted in a contrasting dark color which adds depth to the scene.

On the floor beside the stove, there is a pile of dark, cylindrical objects – possibly logs for burning – placed within a round, shallow container, perhaps a lid or tray. The scene suggests a rustic, possibly rural kitchen setting. The environment looks used and lived-in, enhancing the overall feel of simplicity and homeliness in the photograph.
title: August vogel stands in front of the wood burning stove he and his wife use for cooking in the kitchen of their home.  Mr.  Vogel chops the wood to keep the stove kindled.  The couple live in a county seat trading center of 13,000 in a farming area of south central Minnesota.  New ulm was founded in 1854 by a german immigrant land company that encouraged its kinsmen to emigrate from europe.  The town has grown steadily with the arrival of manufacturing firms
